name: Order History
description: This component shows a list of customer orders in a table format.

attribute_definitions.name: Show Order Number
attribute_definitions.description: Toggle to show/hide the order number column

attribute_definitions.name: Show Creation Date
attribute_definitions.description: Toggle to show/hide the creation date column

attribute_definitions.name: Show Status
attribute_definitions.description: Toggle to show/hide the status column

attribute_definitions.name: Show Actions
attribute_definitions.description: Toggle to show/hide the actions column

attribute_definitions.name: Maximum Orders to Display
attribute_definitions.description: Maximum number of orders to display (max 20)
